metadata.title: Design and cloning of CRISPR sgRNA library

params.note: Select up to five sgRNAs targeting each of the 438 genes of interest and add an extra 10% safe‑harbour‑targeting negative control sgRNAs.
Append cloning restriction sites and amplification primer handles to each oligo and synthesize the sgRNA library oligos on the Agilent chip oligo array synthesis platform.
Clone the synthesized oligos into a lentiviral plasmid vector that constitutively expresses the sgRNA and mCherry.
